posts.post_title: 1909 T204 Ramly Walter Johnson PSA 2 for sale
posts.post_content:
1909 T204 Ramly Walter Johnson PSA 2 for sale.

This is a great looking 2 with outstanding eye appeal. No horrible staining and no horrible gold chipping.

Sold
